pages.text: 26|207|name, tamen yiqian suo xiangshou de, duiyu tamen, jiujing you she me haochu ne?
26|208|Wo bu huimie renhe chengshi, chufei na chengshi li yi youguo ruogan jinggao zhe,
26|209|qu jiaohui qizhong de jumin; wo bushi bu yi de.
26|210|Emomen meiyou daizhe ta jiangxia.
26|211|Na duiyu tamen ji bushi shiyi de, ye bushi tamen suo neng de.
26|212|Tamen que shi bei quzhu er bude yu wen de.
26|213|Chu an la wai, ni buyao qidao bie de shenling, yimian ni zaoshou xingfa.
26|214|Ni yingdang jinggao ni de qinqi.
26|215|Ni duiyu gensui ni di naxie xinshi, yingdang jiayi ci'ai.
26|216|Ruguo ni de qinqi weikang ni, ni yingdang shuo:“Wo duiyu nimen de xingwei que shi wugan de.”
26|217|Ni yingdang tuo kao wanneng de, zhi ci de zhu.
26|218|Ni qili de shihou, ta kanjian ni,
26|219|erqie kanjian ni lu zhong libai de zhongzhong dongzuo.
26|220|Ta que shi quan cong de, que shi quanzhi de.
26|221|Wo gaosu nimen, emomen fu zai shei de shenshang, hao ma?
26|222|Emomen fu zai mei ge zaoyao de zuiren shenshang.
26|223|Tamen ze er er ting, tamen daban shi shuohuang de.
26|224|Shirenmen bei mi wu zhe suo gensui.
26|225|Ni bu zhidao ma? Tamen zai ge shangu zhong fanghuang.
26|226|Tamen zhi shang kongtan, bu chong shijian.
26|227|Wei xindao er xingshan bing duo jinian an la, erqie zai qiya zhihou congshi ziwei de ren chuwai, bu yi zhe, jianglai jiu zhidao tamen huode shenme guisu.
